DecomposableInput<A> - Class in com.schlimm.forkjoindip
Abstract class that wraps the input of a ForkJoinTask task.
DecomposableInput(A) - Constructor for class com.schlimm.forkjoindip.DecomposableInput
Standard constructor.
decompose() - Method in class com.schlimm.forkjoindip.DecomposableInput
Subclasses implement this method to decompose the input into smaller peaces if task is too large to be computed directly.

F

Subclasses implement this method to decide how to distribute processing of the decomposed input objects.

ForkAndJoinProcessor<A extends ForkAndJoinTaskPrototype<?>> - Class in com.schlimm.forkjoindip
Abstract class that isolates the logic how a list of input objects can be distributed across multiple threads using ForkJoinTask#fork() operations.
ForkAndJoinProcessor(A) - Constructor for class com.schlimm.forkjoindip.ForkAndJoinProcessor
 
forkAndJoinTask - Variable in class com.schlimm.forkjoindip.ForkAndJoinProcessor
 
ForkAndJoinTaskPrototype<A> - Interface in com.schlimm.forkjoindip
Interface to be implemented to enhance ForkJoinTask and enable them to participate in the dip-Framework.

G

GenericRecursiveTask - Class in com.schlimm.forkjoindip
A generic recursive task that implements the typical fork and join workflow.

GenericSplitProcessor - Class in com.schlimm.forkjoindip
Generic implementation of a scenario where an input is decomposed into two parts that get distributed accross two threads using ForkJoinTask#fork()
